mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS P_CARD,ID,P_NAME,P_MONEY FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ID,P_NAME,SUM(P_MONEY) OVER(PARTITION BY P_MONEY) AS P_MONEY FROM SPENDING WHERE TO_CHAR(P_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM')=#{p_location} ORDER BY P_MONEY DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=3 AND ID=#{id}

SELECT ROWNUM AS P_CARD,ID,P_NAME,P_COUNT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ID,P_NAME,COUNT(P_DETAIL) OVER(PARTITION BY P_NAME) AS P_COUNT FROM SPENDING WHERE TO_CHAR(P_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM')=#{p_location} ORDER BY P_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=3
SELECT DISTINCT ID,SUM(P_MONEY) OVER(PARTITION BY ID) AS P_MONEY FROM SPENDING WHERE TO_CHAR(P_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM')=#{p_location} AND ID=#{id}
SELECT P_SEQ,ID,P_NAME,P_DETAIL,P_LOCATION,P_REGDATE,P_MONEY,P_SOME,P_CASHABLE,P_CARD FROM SPENDING WHERE TO_CHAR(P_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM')=#{p_location} AND ID=#{id} ORDER BY P_NAME DESC
SELECT DISTINCT RN,I_SEQ,ID,I_NAME,I_MONEY,I_FIX,I_REGDATE,I_MONEY,I_MODIDATE FROM (SELECT I.*,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY I_MONEY DESC) AS RN FROM INCOME I) WHERE id=#{id} AND RN<4 ORDER BY RN
